tag_professor: GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  GRADED BY FEW THINGS  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: She does not care for the student\'s creativity, she is disrespectful, and mean. She is the worse teacher. Makes you spend a lot of money in items that are not necessary for the class. She always try to humiliate students in from of everyone and makes you feel worthless. students walked out class the very first day of the semester. don\'t choose her

tag_professor: GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: She is by far the worst professor I\'ve ever had. She made us spend $200+ on art supplies we never use, had us write a ton of useless papers and is impossible to please. She hates everyone\'s art and is condescending. She even made a girl cry in the middle of class. This woman made me never want to take another art class.

tag_professor: GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: This is by far the most frustrating teacher I\'ve ever had. She\'s horrible. Never answers the questions we ask and tells us our art is wrong. How can art be "wrong?" Plus she\'s no fun to look at. Do not take her for basic design. The projects she assigns require us to spend a minimum of 6-7 hours out of class doing and redoing stupid projects.

tag_professor: GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: One of the WORST teachers in any college let alone SU. She is horrible. Disorganized, rude and condescending to students. I can\'t believe they re-upped her for next semester. She drags the department down. Her assignments were ridiculous and stupid and she forced students to installation even when that is not their focus. She should be fired.

tag_professor: GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: Had to drop this class. I had NO interest in repeating Sculpture I. She is disorganized, insulting, condescending, rude, and her requirements for fulfilling the ever-changing course objectives, as they changed daily, were impossible. Definitely would NEVER recommend. Avoid her classes like the plague if you love art and want to stay with it!

tag_professor: GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: She is a horrible teacher who is extremely scatter brained. she knows a lot about art but does not explain well at all. Her tests are ridiculous. She originally had one paper in the syllabus and has added three more that she grades ridiculously and doesnt tell you what she is looking for. I do not recommend her. she ruined my love of art.

tag_professor: GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Tough Grader (1)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)
comments: I did not like her. She is very scatter brained. She teaches the class as if she was teaching grad school.She knows alot of information but doesnt really know what she is doing. We didnt actually start doing anything in her class until 3 weeks into the semester.
